name: *QUICK SHIP*
description:
Applies to *US First Class Parcel ONLY*

Don't forget a "Priority Mail upgrade" is available for an

name: Color Blocked Chemise For Hot Flashes
description:
Two tone detailing scoop neck line light weight
100% absorbent performance fabric made 
especially for Night sweats.

Silhouette features adjustable straps empire-waist
slightly fitted style.

Garment Length: Lower thigh approx. 30"from center front 

Fabric details:
Reliefs hot flashes and night sweats keeps you cool 
dry, comfortable and asleep.

*Black fabric light weight pique
*Carney blue light weight stay dry poly blend jersey knit 

Our garments draw perspiration away from your body
moisture wicked action consumes the sweat while distributing
it to the outer area of the garment where it evaporates & dries quickly. 



Proudly manufactured on demand in Limited Quantity.
Made in the USA 


***************************************************
SIZES:

*SMALL         6-8*  Bust-34-36) (Waist-26-27) (Hip-37-38)

*MED          10-12* Bust-37-38) (Waist-26-28  (Hip-39-41)

*LARGE      14-16* Bust-39-41  (Waist-30-33  (Hip-42-44)

*XL              18-20* Bust-42-44 (Waist-35-36   (Hip-45-48)

***************************************************

Garment care:
Machine wash with like colors, non chlorine bleach if needed 
LINE DRY, like most performance fabrics or micro-fiber products
these work best without the use of fabric softeners or dryer sheets. 


US Priority flat rate *tracking# included sent via email

Thank you for viewing my shop..

Barbara

name: Sweat Wicking Sleeve Less Nightgown
description:
Tank style design, made from the same moisture-wicking 

technology light airy breathable absorbent, lace trim accent

v-neck line lettuce hem.

These nighties are made in a longer length relax
fit through-out, lower calf length.

Combat power surges, night sweats and summer moments 
day or night, color on your monitor may differ slightly from 
the color of the  merchandise delivered.

Fabric details: Lightweight polyester jersey knit blend
Sweat wicking action pulls moisture away from the skin where
it evaporates and dries quickly leaving your skin cool and dry.

Sizes:
S- Bust - 32" - 34" / Waist - 27" - 29" / Hip - 36 - 38"

M- Bust - 34" - 36" / Waist - 29" - 31" / Hip - 38" - 40"

L- Bust -: 36" - 38" / Waist - 31" - 33" / Hip - 40" - 42"

XL- Bust - 38" - 40" / Waist - 33" - 35" / Hip - 42" - 44"

XXL- Bust - 40 "- 42" / Waist - 35" - 38" / Hip - 44" - 46"



Garment care:
Machine wash with like colors, non chlorine bleach if 
needed, dry low heat.
Performs best when washed without fabric softeners 
or the use of dryer sheets. 

~US orders ships Priority flat rate~

Made in the USA,

name: Pillow Cases for Night Sweats
description:
Includes 2 Flip-Less™ Pillow Cases with heat and 
moisture management technology.

Temperature comfort system transports moisture while 
 
sweating due to menopause, hot flashes or power surges. 

Why use Flip-Less Pillow Cases by HCS?
Our ultra soft cases keeps wetness away from 
your skin releasing it into the air.

~Wicks away heat and moisture
~Quick Drying
~Super Soft & Lightweight
~Cottony feel
~Ideal for the entire family

Machine washable line dry, wash in cool water do not use fabric softeners of any kind no ironing required these are wrinkle-free.


Proudly handcrafted in the USA 

**********************************
SIZES/
Queen size includes set of 2 standard cases. 
Pillow case standard (20" X 30")


King size includes set of 2 standard cases.
Pillow case standard (20" X 40") 
***************************

name: Sweat Wicking Hairwraps
description:
Offering sweat resistant menopausal and technology driven 

products that absorbs perspiration keeping you cool and dry.

These hair accessories are slightly stretchable, light weight textured performance fabric.

Features: 100% stay dry wicking poly-blend fabric

*Lined Solid Black

*Triangle: style one size fits ALL

*Comfortable secure fit

*One size fits all ties in back

*Made in the USA

Garment care:
Machine wash with like colors, non chlorine bleach if needed 
LINE DRY, like most performance fabrics or micro-fiber products
these work best without the use of fabric softeners or dryer sheets. 

Ships First Class Mail (Tracking # not included)

SHIPPING UPGRADE AVAILABLE

description:
Offers two layers of wicking fabric, lightweight breathable stay dry 

hair accessories, our headwraps are created using a Poly blend 

microfiber technical fabric made for comfort and durability.

Front- Band is Supplex spandex performance wicking fabric. 
Features sweat wicking revolutionary abilities throughtout.    

BENEFITS:
Adds longevity to your Wrapped hair style, excellent for Night sweats, Power surges, Hot flashes, Flat iron, Pinned or unpinned wrap.

description:
